body: I think 10 is fine. High enough so you don't hit it unless you're trying to hoard guilds, low enough so a person with the max number of guilds doesn't have an unreasonable amount of power.
body_html: I think 10 is fine. High enough so you don't hit it unless you're trying to hoard guilds, low enough so a person with the max number of guilds doesn't have an unreasonable amount of power.
